title: Library Management Course Utilizing Team-Based Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of library systems and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Team project-based learning design grounded in the ADDIE model. Operated in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment with collaboration and resource-sharing capabilities via a learning management system (LMS)

learning_goals: Teams can analyze digital management systems in libraries and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can share learning materials and incorporate feedback using collaboration tools in a mobile microlearning environment.
Learners can mathematically model and optimize core library operation metrics (e.g., budget, space utilization, user satisfaction).

resources: Team Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
